output:
I'm feeling anxious, I'm feeling pain I wish these things would go away, they're driving me insane
Time and again, someone brings me down I'd pick myself back up but someone's tied me to the ground
So how do I do this, when I'm on my own And everyone's turned on me and I'm losing my control
I would get up again if my thoughts trusted me But you'd bring me down again, doesn't know what I wanna see
Doesn't know what I wanna see
Feeling paranoid, I feel no shame I'm stuck here dealing with the consequence of someone else's game
Take it all away, leave me shy I don't know why I bother, you're just wasting all my time
